definition: square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)

pinyin: ping2 fang1 fan3 bi4 ding4 lu:4

sentences.english: In Hong Kong many square miles of land have been reclaimed from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，許多平方英里的陸地都是填海開拓出來的。

sentences.english: Specifically, luminosity is proportional to radius squared.
sentences.chinese: 具體來說，光度與半徑的平方呈正比。

sentences.english: The year before, 2, 295 square kilometers (1, 426 square miles) were destroyed over that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在上一個年度，有2295平方公里的森林被毀。

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港幣二十八元。

sentences.english: All the panes of glass in the world today cover about four billion square metres.
sentences.chinese: 如今全世界所有玻璃板總計約有四十億平方米。

sentences.english: Located in Xuhui District Shanghai with total floor area of 9,200 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 位於上海市徐彙區，總建築面積約9，200平方米。

sentences.english: The average rate for the second floor is two hundred Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 第二層的平均租金是每平方英尺港幣二百元。

sentences.english: The standard premise covers 4800 square meters in total.
sentences.chinese: 我公司擁有標準廠房4800平方米。

sentences.english: Cabins can be up to seven square metres - that is bigger than many hotel rooms.
sentences.chinese: 包廂面積超過7平方米，這可比許多旅館房間都要大。

sentences.english: All right. So we have that square root NR.
sentences.chinese: 好，看看這個NR求平方根方法。

sentences.english: The island has an area of 14 sq. km.
sentences.chinese: 這個島的面積是14平方公里。

sentences.english: Four beds, four baths, all ensuite, just over three thousand square feet.
sentences.chinese: 一套面積爲三千平方英尺的四居四衛公寓？

sentences.english: The living space is measured in square metres.
sentences.chinese: 居住面積用平方米計算。

sentences.english: For all integers , is a perfect square.
sentences.chinese: 對於每個整數，都是完全平方數。

definition: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
cube (math.)/abbr. for 立方體|立方体[li4 fang1 ti3]/abbr. for 立方米[li4 fang1 mi3]
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
one bedroom and one living room
alcove/bay in a room/unit of length used for rooms, approx. 3.3 meters
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
